description:
Glue these solidly constructed D-ring anchors at strategic points inside your canoe hull to keep paddlers and cargo from sliding around when running lumpy water. The D-ring is held with sturdy webbing, solidly sewn to the patch. The patch is large enough to provide a big area for bonding to your boat.

  • 5cm-wide (2in.) D-rings, made of stainless steel
  • Patch made of rugged, heavy-duty vinyl, in a neutral soft gray that works with any boat colour
  • Use Vinyl-Tec 2000, and follow the instructions carefully, to glue D-rings into most canoes
name: North Water D-Ring Anchors 2"
